name: Knight of Sacrifice
description:
This is a game about a knight, who has to save is village from the anual fairy creatures invasion, and to gain power has to sacrifice his own people!

We didn't have time to do a tutorial so here it is:

W,A,S,D - movement

left mouse button - attack

Near the village:
Q- Sacrifice to gain Life

E- Sacrifice to gain Upgrades!

(Be carefull with the sacrifices)
